nodes.text: The Zygerrian slave market was a slave market on the planet of Zygerria. The market was controlled by the Zygerrian Slave Empire. During the Clone Wars, the Galactic Republic and the Jedi Order undertook a mission to the planet looking for the missing Togruta people from the planet Kiros. While searching Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano draw unwanted attention on the market when she prevented a Zygerrian from whipping a slave. Eventually Tanivos Exantor Divo would add to his files a flyer for the market that would later be collected on the set of security files Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious by Tanivos' grandson Exantor Divo.
